senses.synonym: greatness: the property possessed by something or someone of outstanding importance or eminence <i64148>

relations.target: amazing: inspiring awe or admiration or wonder; 'New York is an amazing city'; 'the Grand Canyon is an awe-inspiring sight'; 'the awesome complexity of the universe'; 'this sea, whose gently awful stirrings seem to speak of some hidden soul beneath'- Melville; 'Westminster Hall's awing majesty, so vast, so high, so silent' <i6996>
